channel.title: Untagged on natescode blog
channel.description: Recent content in Untagged on natescode blog

item.title: Tailwind: Debunking the Debunkers
item.description: I’ve seen a TON of hate for Tailwind. While I don’t care much about which technologies other developers use, I do care when developers spread lies because they are religiously for or against a particular technology. I’m not much of a technology fan-boy; I use what works for the given requirements. Don’t get me wrong, I still have plenty of strong opinions but they’re more about general techniques, attitudes etc and not about specific libraries or technologies.
